channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Secret Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Secret Server

item.title: CVE-2021-20582|2024-09-17T01:02:08.897Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server up to 11.0 stores sensitive information in URL parameters. This may lead to information disclosure if unauthorized parties have access to the URLs via server logs, referrer header or browser history. IBM X-Force ID: 199328.
